message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,000 just isn't enough for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but how about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500. I hope this is within your range and allows us to reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go any lower than $11,000. This would give you a good deal, and it's the best I can offer at this point.

Hello Alice, I've been considering our previous offers and I would like to propose an offer of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price for both parties and I hope it will lead to a successful transaction.

Bob, we're getting close! I'm feeling generous today, so I'm willing to come down to $11,250. This is a great deal for both of us, and I'm sure you'll be happy with the product. Let's close this deal!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
